contexts.context: After the horrible persecution of Chișinău and <mark>Gomel</mark>, after the ridiculous comedy what was the Chișinău...
...more Russians than Jews in the Kishinev pogroms and <mark>Gomel</mark> altogether! How can he not weep?
...the 31st day, he was luckily sent to <mark>Gomel</mark> with the same train where he again was arrested...
